events.name: Halloween Benediction with Minister Vallor
events.description: Join Minister Thomas O'Brien Vallor for a walking Halloween benediction from Salem.

events.name: A Satanic Kitty Meet & Greet
events.description: Join Minister Hadrian Flyte and Speedwagon for a Satanic Kitty Meet & Greet.

events.name: Live Art & Tunes with Mar Williams
events.description: Join Mar, famed drawer of vaguely cat shaped creatures, Defcon artist of over a decade, and enjoyer of fine hams, for a live spooky art event to get Halloween month going right! Ask questions in the chat and Mar will answer them during the livestream!

events.name: Bats in the Belfry!
events.description: Livestreaming your new best friends, bats from BatWorld. Donate at batworld.org

events.name: Cute Little Demons: Black Cats
events.description: Join Salem Witch Wiles for an exploration of the history of black cats in superstition and mythology.

events.name: Autonetic Afterlife
events.description: Join Lazermortis for the launch of her synthwave album Autonetic Afterlife. Autonetic Afterlife is Lazerâ€™s imagining of what an afterlife might look like to artificial intelligence. Rebirth tells the story of a rogue sentient android running for her life in a post-apocalyptic world, only to be cornered by authorities and terminated.

events.name: Grey Faction Satanic Archives
events.description: TSTVHQ's Satanic Archive Library is open all night. Texts courtesy of Center for Inquiry and Grey Faction.
